TEXT.TITLE: <CLAYTON AND DUBILIER INC> SELLS BURPEE
TEXT.BODY: Privately-held Clayton and Dubilier Inc said it has sold W. Atlee Burpee Co to a new company formed by Wicks Capital Corp, Bankers Trust New York Corp <BT> aND Burpee management for undisclosed terms. The garden supply company was acquired from ITT Corp <ITT> in December along with O.M. Scott and Sons Co. Reuter
